Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black (partly worn); bands in added white above lotus flower and bud frieze in white outline with added red centres; exterior: two bands; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Possibly context Φ4. (?)
Curator's comments: The number '4' is written in pencil on the exterior of the sherd, possibly a context number (Context Φ4?)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1541) (phase 2)
